title: React for Beginners
description: Master React fundamentals with hands-on projects. Learn components, hooks, state management, and build real-world applications from scratch.

title: Advanced Machine Learning
description: Deep dive into neural networks, deep learning, and advanced ML algorithms. Build production-ready AI models with TensorFlow and PyTorch.

title: JavaScript ES6+ Masterclass
description: Modern JavaScript features, async/await, promises, and advanced patterns. Write cleaner, more efficient code.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn design principles, color theory, typography, and create stunning user interfaces. Tools: Figma, Adobe XD.

title: Full-Stack Development Bootcamp
description: Complete full-stack course covering Node.js, Express, MongoDB, React. Build and deploy production applications.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn. Analyze data, create visualizations, and build predictive models.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Master AWS services including EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS. Deploy scalable cloud applications with best practices.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Build native iOS and Android apps with React Native. Cross-platform development made easy.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Protect systems and networks. Learn penetration testing, encryption, security protocols, and ethical hacking.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: SEO, social media marketing, content strategy, and analytics. Grow your online presence and drive conversions.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Smart contracts, Solidity, Web3.js, and DApp development. Build decentralized applications on Ethereum.

title: 3D Modeling with Blender
description: Create stunning 3D models, animations, and visual effects. From basics to advanced rendering techniques.
